name: The ice man.
description:
Water levels have risen due to climate change.   How long the ice man will survive in this world  now surrounded by  the ocean ?   Run , jump and reach the boat to be safe. 

Important : play in full screen mode , as  the play button might not appear  on some screen resolution on the webgl version. 

Controls:  arrow keys,  Space to jump. 

Genre : platform.
